questions.question: Look at the sign or notice.Choose the correct answer A, B or C.

choices.answer: The product can last five days after opening.
The product should be stored in a refrigerator immediately.
The product doesn't have to be kept cool.

questions.question: Look at the sign or notice. Choose the correct answer A, B or C.

choices.answer: We prefer you to pay with a credit card or in cash.
You must have a credit card and a cheque as well as cash.
You may pay with a credit card, cheque or in cash.

questions.question: Why is David apologising to Maria?. Choose the correct answer A, B or C.

choices.answer: He cannot do the favour he had promised.
He hasn't had time to fix her laptop.
He won't be able to go to the meeting with her.

questions.question: Look at the sign or notice. Choose the correct answer A, B or C.

choices.answer: It costs at least Â£50 to park here for two hours.
There are no parking charges after 2.00pm.
You have to pay a fine if you park here for three hours.

questions.question: Look at the sign or notice. Choose the correct answer A, B or C.

choices.answer: You mustn't speak during the examination.
Respect others and remain quiet during the examination.
Do not talk to the teacher.
